segments.text: Ann , let's go , or we will be late .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we still have about 15 minutes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What time did you say the train is leaving ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 12:05 . And it takes only 20 minutes to get to the station by bus .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but what will happen if the bus is late ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Relax , those buses run every 10 minutes , so we have plenty of time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ( still on the bus . ) What time is it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is a quarter to twelve .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh dear , we will miss our train .
segments.speaker: S1
